title: Elderberries as a Flu Remedy
author: Laura Johannes
description: There is preliminary evidence that the elderberry—often consumed as a syrup—can shorten the duration of flu symptoms.
cleaned_text: Feb. 3, 2014 6:12 pm ET The Claim: The deep purple, almost black berries from the elder tree can shorten the duration of colds and flus, and help boost the immune system.
